comment.author: 61354032@N05
comment._content:
Joe Gantman was my mother's first cousin.  She often talked about her Uncle David who owned a Kosher Meat Market in Saint Paul.  I met Joe in 1960-1970's when the Benjamin Family from Sacramento, CA would visit relatives in St. Paul and Minneapolis.  My mother, Sara Hochstat Benjamin always told us stories of growing up in St. Paul and her Jewish connection there.  She was the first Jewish woman in St. Paul to sign up for the WACS during WWII.
Contact me: Diane Merrick dianemerrick@verizon.net
